snippet: The Federal Reserve’s long-awaited report said that big banks had taken significant steps in deferring a greater portion of compensation and shifting more pay in the form of stock.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)

lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve’s long-awaited report said that big banks had taken significant steps in deferring a greater portion of compensation and shifting more pay in the form of stock.

headline.main: Fed Reports Modest Progress in Bank Compensation Plans
headline.print_headline: Fed Reports Modest Progress in Bank Compensation Plans
headline.seo: Fed Sees Modest Progress in Bank Compensation Plans
